attributes.action: PM to ask the WHO withdraw Robert Mugabe as a WHO goodwill ambassador
attributes.background: During 2016, the government of President Robert Mugabe intensified repression against thousands of people who protested human rights violations and the deteriorating economic situation. It disregarded the rights provisions in the 2013 constitution, & implemented no meaningful human rights reforms.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the WHO has published this statement:

http://www.who.int/mediacentre/news/statements/2017/goodwill-ambassador-rescinded/en/
